# New version of `gsync`

## What's new?

- Update of `clap`, now in v4!
- GHA updates for release
- fix clippy warning
- new doc for install, usage and concept

## How to install?

```bash
git clone https://github.com/Xavier2p/gitsync.git && cd gitsync
cargo install --path .
```
